events.header.description: You can usually catch me grooving alongside some of the coolest DJs in and around the 'Mittelfranken' region.
footer.message:
Available for booking and collaboration.
Feel free to contact me.
message.opening: I've been doing MC Scrpt for almost 10 years now.
message.body:
I am really proud and happy that I can express myself creatively.
I am glad that you have accepted me so well!
I don't know what the future holds, but I need to update my website!
